saśailavanadhātrīṇāṃ yathādhāro ’hināyakaḥ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ tathādhāro hi kuṇḍalī//
suptā guruprasādena yadā jāgarti kuṇḍalī/
tathā padmāni sarvāṇi bhidyante granthayo’pi ca//
prāṇasya śūnyapadavī
tadā rājapathāyate/
tadā cittaṃ nirālambaṃ tadā kālasya vañcanam//
suṣumṇā śūnyapadavī brahmarandhraṃmahāpathaḥ/
śmaśānaṃ śāmbhavī madhyaṃvācakāḥ//
tasmāt sarvaprayatnena prabodhayitum īśvarīm/
brahmadvāramukhe suptāṃ mudrābhyāsaṃ samācaret//
mahāmudrā mahābandho mahāvedhaś ca khecarī/
uḍḍiyānaṃ mūla°bandhaḥ tato jālandharābhidhaḥ//
karaṇī viparītākhyā vajrolī śakticālanam/
idaṃ ca mudrādaśakaṃ jarāmaraṇanāśanam//
ādināthoditaṃ sarvaṃm aṣṭaiśvaryapradāyakam/
vallabhaṃ sarvasiddhānāṃ durlabhaṃ marutām api//
gopanīyaṃ prayatnena yathā ratnakaraṇḍakam/
kasyacin naiva vaktavyaṃ kulastrīsurataṃ tathā//
pādamūlena vāmena yoniṃ saṃpīḍya dakṣiṇam/
pāda prasāritaṃ dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ dhārayenmukham//
kaṇṭhe bandhaṃ samāropya dhārayed vāyum ūrdhvataḥ/
yathā daṇḍāhataḥ sarpo daṇḍākāraḥ prajāyate//
ṛjvībhūtā tathā śaktiḥ kuṇḍalī sahasā bhavet/
tadā sā maṇāvasthā jāyate dvipuṭāśritā//
tataḥ śanaiḥ śanair eva recayen na tu vegataḥ/
iyaṃ khalu mahāmudrā mahāsiddhaiḥ praśasyate//
mahānkleśādayo doṣāḥ kṣīyante maraṇādayaḥ/
mahāmudrāṃ ca tenaiva vadanti vibudhottamāḥ//
candrāṅge ca samabhyasya sūryāṅge punar abhyaset/
yāvasaṃkhyā bhavetulyā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet//
nāpathyaṃ na hi pathyaṃ ca rasāḥ sarve’pi nīrasāḥ/
api bhuktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam iva jīryate//
kṣayakuṣṭhagudāvartagulmājīrṇapurogamāḥ/
doṣāḥ sarve kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo’bhyaset//
kathiteyaṃ mahāmudrā mahāsiddhikarī nṛṇām/
gopanīyāṃ prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit//
pārṣṇi bhāgena pādasya yonisthāne niyojayet/
vāmorūpari saṃsthāpya dakṣiṇaṃ caraṇaṃ tathā//
pūrayitvā tato vāyuṃ hṛdaye cibukaṃ dṛḍham/
nikṣipya yonim ākuñcya mano madhye niyojayet//
dhārayitvā yathāśaktyā recayed anilaṃ śanaiḥ//
savyāṅge ca samabhyasya dakṣiṇe punarbhyaset//
matārettamaṃtra tu keṣāṃcit kaṇṭhebandhaṃ vivarjayet/
rājadantasya jihvāyāṃ bandhaḥ śasto bhaveddhitaḥ//
ayaṃ kila mahābandhaḥ sarvasiddhipradāyakaḥ/
kālapāśamahābandhavimocanavicakṣaṇaḥ//
ayaṃ ca sarvanāḍīnām ūrdhvaṃgativibodhakaḥ/
triveṇīsaṅgamaṃ dhatte kedāraṃ prāpayen manaḥ//
rūpalāvaṇyasaṃpannaṃ yathā strī puruṣaṃ vinā/
mahāmudrāmahābandho niṣphalau vedhavarttitau//
mahāvedhasthitau yogī kṛtvā pūraka/
vāyunā gatim āvṛtya nibhṛtaṃ kaṇṭhamudrāyā//
samahastāyugo bhūmau sphijau saṃtāḍayec chanaiḥ/
puṭadvayaṃ samākramya vāyuḥ sphurati satvaraṃ/
bandhenānena sādhayet sarvam īpsitam//
somasūryāgnisambandhāj jāyate ca mṛturjayaḥ/
mṛtāvasthā samutpannā tato vāyuṃ virecayet//
mahāvedho’yam abhyāsān mahāsiddhipradāyakaḥ/
valītapalitabandhaghnaḥ sevyate sādhakottamaiḥ//
etat trayaṃ mahāmudrā jarāmṛtyuvināśinī/
vahnivṛddhikaraṃ caivam aṇimādiguṇapradam//
aṣṭadhā kriyate caikaṃ yāme yāme dine dine/
sarvasaṃcārasaṃdhāyī pāpaughabhiduraṃ sadā//
samyakjijñāsatāmevaṃ svalpaṃ prathamasādhanaṃ/
vahnistrīpathasevanāmm ādau varjanaācaret//
chedanaṃcālanaṃ dohau kāla krameṇa pravardhayettāt/
sā yāvad bhrūmadhyaṃ spṛśati tadā khecarīsiddhiḥ//
kapālakuhare jihvā praviṣṭā viparītagā/
bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī//
kālaṃ parāṅmukhī kṛtya /
mudrā vyomacakraṃ tad ucyate/
rasanām ūrdhvagāṃ kṛtvā
kṣaṇārdhaṃ api tiṣṭhati/
kṣaṇena mucyate yogī vyādhimṛtyujarādibhiḥ//
na rogān maraṇaṃ tasya na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā/
na ca mūrchā bhave tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm//
cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā/
tenaiva khecarī mudrā sarva siddhair namaskṛtā//
khecaryā mudritaṃ yena vivaraṃ lambikordhvataḥ/
tasya na kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāśleṣitasya ca//
calito’pi yadā binduḥ saṃprāptacāgnimaṇḍalaṃ/
vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ haṭhāc chaktyānirodho yogamudrayā//

ūrdhvajihvā sthito bhūtvā somapānaṃ karoti yaḥ/
māsārdhena na saṃdeho mṛtyuṃ jayati yogavit//
nityaṃ somakalāpūrṇe śarīraṃ yasya dehinaḥ/
takṣakeṇāpi daṣṭasya viṣaṃ tasya na sarpati//
indhanāni yathā vahnitailavartī ca dīpakaḥ/
tathā somakalāpūrṇa dehī dehaṃ na mucyati//
gomāṃsa bhakṣayen nityaṃ pibed amaravāruṇīm/
kulīnaṃ tam ahaṃ viṃdyāṃ itare kulaghātakāḥ//
gośabdenoditā jihvā tatpraveśo hi tāluniṃ/
gomāṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ tat tu mahāpātakanāśanam//
jihvāpraveśasaṃbhūtavahninottāpito daraṃ/
candrāt sravati yaḥ sāraḥ sā syāaṃmavāruṇī//
mūrdhneḥ ṣoḍaśapadmapattragalitaṃ prāṇād avāptaṃ haṭhā-
d ūrdhvāsyo rasanāṃ vidhāya vivare śaktiṃ parāṃ cintayet/
uttakallolajalākulaṃ su vimalaṃ dhārāmṛtaṃ yaḥ pibet
nirdoṣaḥ sa mṛṇālakomalatanur yogī ciraṃ jīvati//
cumbantī yadi lambikāgram aniśaṃ jihvā śiraḥsyandinī
sakṣāra kaṭukādya dugdhasadṛśī madhvādyatulyaṃtathā/
vyādhīnāṃ haraṇaṃ jarāntakaraṇaṃ śāstrāgamodgīraṇaṃ
tasya syād amaratvam aṣṭaguṇitaṃ siddhāṅganākarṣaṇam//
ekaṃ sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ ekā mudrā ca khecarī/
eko devo nirālambaṃ ekāvasthā manonmanī//
pārṣṇibhāgena saṃpīḍya yonim ākuñcayedṛḍhaṃ/
apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūlabandho’yam ucyate//
adhogatam apānaṃ vai ūrdhvagaṃ kurute balāt/
ākuñcya tena taṃ prāhumūlabandho hi yoginaḥ//
gudaṃ pārṣṇyā tu saṃpīḍya vāyum ākuñcayed balāt/
vāraṃ vāraṃ yathā cordhvaṃ samāyāti samīraṇaḥ//
prāṇāpānau nādabindu mūlabandhena caikatām/
gatvā yogasya saṃsiddhyaiḥ pamāta tra na saṃśayaḥ//
apānaprāṇa°yor aikye kṣayo mūtrapurīṣayoḥ/
yuvā bhavati vṛddho’pi satataṃ mūlabandhanāt//
apāne cordhvam āpāte prayāte nābhimaṇḍalaṃ/
tathānalaśikhā dīrghā kriyate vāyunāhatāḥ//
tato yāte vahniyonau prāṇamūla svarūpakaḥ/
tenābhyantaḥpradīptas tu kuto dehakṣayas tadā//
tena kuṇḍalinī suptā saṃtaptā saṃprabudhyate/
daṇḍāhatā bhujaṅgīva viśvasya rijutām iyāt//
bilaṃ praviṣṭaś ca tato brahmanāḍyantare vrajet/
tasmān nityaṃ mūlabandhaḥ kartavyo yogibhiḥ sadā//
ūrdhvo kṣitaḥ suṣumṇāyāḥ prāṇas tūḍḍīyate yataḥ/
tasmāc cauḍḍiyānākhyo yogibhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ//
uḍḍiyānaṃ kurute yasmād aviśrāntaṃ mahākhagaḥ/
uḍḍiyānaṃ tad eva syākṣetra bandho ’bhidhīyate//
udare paścima tānaṃ nābheūrdhve tu kārayet/
uḍḍiyāno hy asau bandho mṛtyumātaṅgakesarī//
uḍḍiyānaṃ tu sahajaṃ guruṇā kathitaṃ sadā/
abhyasesatataṃ yas tu vṛddho’pi taruṇo bhavet//
nābher ūrdhvam adhaś cāpi tānaṃ kuryāca yatnataḥ/
yogī sam° abhyasan mṛtyuṃ jayaty eva na saṃśayaḥ//
sati vajrāsane pādau karābhyāṃ dhārayed dṛḍham/
gulphadeśasamīpe ca kandaṃ tacca prapīḍyate//
paścimaṃ tānaupari pīḍayed dhṛdaye {crux }galecrux /
śanaiḥ śanair yathā prāṇonāḍīsaṃdhi ni° gacchati//
sarveṣām eva bandhānām uttamo hy uḍḍiyānakaḥ/
uḍḍiyāne dṛḍhe bandhe muktiḥ svābhāvakī bhavet//
kaṇṭham ākuñcya hṛdaye sthāpayedṛḍham icchayā/
bandho jālandharākhyo’yaṃ jarāmṛtyuvināśakaḥ//
badhnāti hi śirājālam adhogāmi nabhojalam/
tato jālandharo bandhaḥ kaṇṭheduḥkhaughanāśanaḥ//
jālandhare kṛte bandhe kaṇṭhasaṃkocalakṣaṇe/
na pīyūṣaṃ pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ pradhāvati//
kaṇṭhasaṃkocanenaiva dve nāḍyau stambhayed dṛḍhaṃ/
madhyaṃ cakramm idaṃ jñeyaṃ ṣoḍaśādhārabandhanam//
bandhatrayam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mahāsiddhaiśca sevitaṃ/
sarveṣāṃ yogatantrāṇāṃ sādhanaṃ yogino viduḥ//
mūlasthānaṃ tu kārayet/
